title: Leadership and Innovation Strategy Design for Educational Technologists

context.prior_knowledge: Web-based instructional design experience and grasp of basic instructional design principles
context.additional_context: Practical workshops and project-based learning environments utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Explain three leadership frameworks for implementing innovative approaches in web-based instructional design
Design and demonstrate nonlinear educational processes that maximize learner engagement
Develop personal leadership strategies responsive to educational technology changes and apply them to real-world cases
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
